text:
Dylan Thomas Sprouse (born August 4, 1992) is an American actor and businessman. He is the twin brother of Cole Sprouse. He is known for his role as Zack Martin on the Disney Channel series "The Suite Life of Zack & Cody" and its spin-off, "The Suite Life on Deck".
He is also the co-founder of a New York brewery called All-Wise Meadery.

annotations.surface_form: The Suite Life of Zack & Cody
